targetLine.text: Of course, the Enchantment Under the Sea Dance they're supposed to go to this, that's where they kiss for the first time.

contextBefore.text: Look, there's a rhythmic ceremonial ritual coming up.

contextAfter.text: Alright kid, you stick to your father like glue and make sure that he takes her to the dance.
George, buddy. remember that girl I introduced you to, Lorraine. What are you writing?
Uh, stories, science fiction stories, about visitors coming down to Earth from another planet.
